legacy.full_text: RT @RashiShrivast18: NEW: Axiom Math, a nascent startup that's developing an AI math whiz, has poached top tier AI talent— largely from Met…

NEW: Axiom Math, a nascent startup that's developing an AI math whiz, has poached top tier AI talent— largely from Meta. Founded by 24-year-old Stanford dropout @CarinaLHong, it's raised $64 million from @BCapitalGroup and others. 

https://t.co/81HKaIftxK

value.string_value: Axiom Math, which has recruited top talent from Meta, has raised $64 million in seed funding to build an AI math whiz.
